resources.string: "Andy, The Fish Robot Tap twice on the screen to start game. Touch the screen or press spacebar to control Andy. Press Menu key for options"
"Paused Tap twice on the screen To Resume"
"Tap twice on the screen To Restart. Touch the screen or press spacebar to control Andy."
"Congratulations, You have a High Score!! Score:"
"Help Andy moves forward on its own with increasing speed and falls under gravity when throttle is off. Press spacebar or tap on screen to give upwards throttle."
"Control Andy, the Fish Robot, while it travels a difficult underwater cave. Please send your feedback to andytherobot@gmail.com"
